actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to participating in voluntary prayer or meditation in public buildings.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that nothing contained in the U.S. Constitution shall abridge the right of persons, lawfully assembled in any public building which is supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of public funds, to participate in voluntary prayer.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to participating in voluntary prayer or meditation in public buildings.
